LanguageData.LotRE_Leather_Elf.label: elf leather
LanguageData.LotRE_Leather_Elf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.LotRE_Leather_ElfHalf.label: half-elf leather
LanguageData.LotRE_Leather_ElfHalf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped half-elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.LotRE_DeerMallorn.label: Lórien deer
LanguageData.LotRE_DeerMallorn.description: A large-sized herding herbivore often found in the elven lands of Lothlórien. Generally peaceful unless disturbed.
LanguageData.LotRE_DeerMallorn.tools.0.label: antlers
LanguageData.LotRE_DeerMallorn.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.LotRE_DeerMallorn.tools.2.label: right hoof
LanguageData.LotRE_DeerMallorn.tools.3.label: teeth
LanguageData.LotRE_DeerMallorn.tools.4.label: head
LanguageData.LotRE_FenceElven.label: Elven, decorative fence
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvishTable2x2c.label: Elven table (2x2)
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvishTable2x2c.description: Can be rotated when placing to get different looks.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenBed.label: Elven lounge bed
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenBed.description: A cushioned lounge for resting, these Elven beds are suited for weary souls in much need of rest from the weight of the mortal world.
LanguageData.LotRE_Chair.label: Elven Chair
LanguageData.LotRE_Chair.description: A comfortable and attractive chair for sitting at a table. This variation is preferred by the Elves.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenCandelabra.label: elven candelabra
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenCandelabra.description: A mount for wax candles to light an area. Can be automatically refueled with wax. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenRoyalBed.label: Elven royal bed
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenRoyalBed.description: A statue of Estë helps soothe souls in this Elven bed. It is very comfy and beautiful. Fits two.
LanguageData.LotRE_WallElven.label: Elven Carved Wall
LanguageData.LotRE_WallElven.description: This carved wall features a vine-like design throughout, reminiscent of woodwork found decorating the rooms of Rivendell.
LanguageData.LotRE_WallElvenEmbrasure.label: Elven Carved Embrasure
LanguageData.LotRE_WallElvenEmbrasure.description: This carved embrasure allows for heavy cover targeting. It features a vine-like design throughout, reminiscent of woodwork found decorating the rooms of Rivendell.
LanguageData.LotRE_Apparel_Cape.label: elf-cape (woodland)
LanguageData.LotRE_Apparel_Cape.description: A fashionable cape worn by the elves that uses dark forest colors.
LanguageData.LotRE_Apparel_CapeCoastal.label: elf-cape (coastal)
LanguageData.LotRE_Apparel_CapeCoastal.description: A fashionable cape worn by the elves. This style features lighter colors from the shore havens.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_SimpleRobeWoodland.desc: A simple robe with green colors.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_SimpleRobeSea.label: elf-robe (coastal)
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_SimpleRobeSea.descripti: A simple robe with sky blue tones.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_SimpleRobeHigh.label: elf-robe (noble)
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_SimpleRobeHigh.descript: A simple robe with golden tones.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleArmorSea.label: falathrim-elf armor
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleArmorSea.descript: Similar to armor used by the Galadhrim, this variant of armor celebrates similar tree motifs, yet abandons rust-capable metals, favoring a blue-dyed leather to celebrate the sky and sea as well.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleArmorWood.label: silvan-elf armor
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleArmorWood.descrip: Armor often worn by wood-elves, or Silvan Elves from the woodland realms.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleArmorTree.label: galadhrim-elf armor
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleArmorTree.descrip: This beautiful armor crafted in the style of the Galadhrim. The Galadhrim, or tree people, are Silvan elves who live in the great Mallorn trees of forests such as Lothlorien. This armor features elements of leaves that have been plated with elements of gold and silver.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleArmor.label: ñoldorin-elf armor
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleArmor.description: Excellent reinforced leather armor laid with fine metals make the finest Elven battle armor for the Ñoldor, a valiant group of elves named the deep-elves for their wisdom and also named sword-elves for their skills in combat.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleHelmetSea.label: falathrim-elf helmet
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleHelmetSea.descrip: A part of the Elven battle armor set used by the Falathrim, or coast-elves.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleHelmetWood.label: silvan-elf helmet
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleHelmetWood.descri: A part of the Elven battle armor set used by the Silvan Elves, or wood-elves.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleHelmetTree.label: galadhrim-elf helmet
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleHelmetTree.descri: A part of the Elven battle armor set used by the Galadhrim, or tree-elves.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleHelmet.label: ñoldorin-elf helmet
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_BattleHelmet.descriptio: A part of the Elven battle armor set used by the skilled Ñoldor, or deep-elves, named for their wisdom.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_WoodElfCrown.label: elf crown
LanguageData.LotRE_ElfApparel_WoodElfCrown.descriptio: A crown crafted in the shape of twigs and leaves to symbolize the woodland domain.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenShieldBuckler.label: elf buckler
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenShieldBuckler.description: A nimble shield commonly used among the elves.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenShieldBuckler.tools.0.label: side
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenShieldBuckler.tools.1.label: buckle
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenShield.label: ñoldorin-elf shield
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenShield.description: Shield commonly used alongside the armor of the Elves.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenShield.tools.0.label: side
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvenShield.tools.1.label: buckle
LanguageData.LotRE_WoodLogMallorn.label: mallorn-wood
LanguageData.LotRE_WoodLogMallorn.description: Wood from mallorn-trees. Lighter yet more durable than common woods, mallorn-wood is useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of mallorn-wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.
LanguageData.LotRE_WoodLogMallorn.tools.0.label: stick
LanguageData.LotRE_Arrow_Mirkwood.label: mirkwood arrow
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Mirkwood.label: mirkwood-elf bow
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Mirkwood.description: Efficient at both close and medium range, this rapid-fire bow provides maximum stopping power for threats to Elven strongholds.
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Mirkwood.tools.0.label: arrow
LanguageData.LotRE_Arrow_Galadhrim.label: galadhrim arrow
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Galadhrim.label: galadhrim-elf bow
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Galadhrim.description: The longbow preferred by the Galadhrim. A powerful long range weapon.
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Galadhrim.tools.0.label: arrow
LanguageData.LotRE_Arrow_Rivendell.label: rivendell arrow
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Rivendell.label: rivendell-elf bow
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Rivendell.description: The High Elves of Rivendell utilize an exceptional longbow that has devestating damage and pinpoint accuracy.
LanguageData.LotRE_Bow_Rivendell.tools.0.label: arrow
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_WhiteKnives.label: elf white knives
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_WhiteKnives.descriptio: Twin white knives provide fast and deadly melee damage to quickly dispatch many foes from the battlefield.
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Saber.label: elf saber
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Saber.description: A true weapon to match the Elves. A tall curved yet slender blade with a hilt decorated with precious metals. Useful for graceful sweeping strikes.
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Saber.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Saber.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Saber.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Lhang.label: elf lhang
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Lhang.description: A true weapon to match the Elves. A tall curved yet slender blade with a hilt decorated with precious metals. Useful for graceful sweeping strikes.
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Lhang.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Lhang.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.LotRE_MeleeWeapon_Lhang.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.LotRE_PlantLembas.label: lembas plant
LanguageData.LotRE_PlantLembas.description: A splendorous grain plant that yields scrumptous golden ears. While similar to corn, the lembas plant can also be made into lembas flour and finally into lembas, or Elven waybread. While frost is its only weakness, this plant thrives wherever sunlight is plentiful, and fertile soil is optional for a very large yield of food over a long growth period.
LanguageData.LotRE_RawLembasCorn.label: lembas corn
LanguageData.LotRE_Lembasflour.label: Lembas flour
LanguageData.LotRE_Lembasflour.description: Flour from lembas corn, used in baking.
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvishBread.label: Elvish bread
LanguageData.LotRE_ElvishBread.description: An elegantly baked loaf of bread made from the golden ears of the lembas plant.
LanguageData.LotRE_LembasWaybread.label: Lembas
LanguageData.LotRE_LembasWaybread.description: Specially prepared slices of Elvish bread that can last for months.
LanguageData.LotRE_PlantTreeMallorn.label: mallorn sapling
LanguageData.LotRE_PlantTreeMallorn.description: A colossal tree of immense beauty, the mallorn is favored by the elves with beautiful leaves, a silver trunk, and incredible longevity. A mallorn sapling may appear to be incredibly tall, however, truly mature and ancient ones can hold entire settlements aloft their branches. The colors of the leaves change to gold during the fall and winter seasons.
LanguageData.LotRE_PlantTreeBirchGolden.label: golden birch tree
LanguageData.LotRE_PlantTreeBirchGolden.description: A northern tree known for its thin, paper-like bark. This variant is favored by the elves for its mallorn-like golden leaf-color in the fall and winter.
LanguageData.LotRE_FilthMallornLeaves.label: mallorn leaves
LanguageData.LotR_HorseRace.label: Horse
LanguageData.LotR_HorseRace.description: A man-sized galloping herbivore, often utilized for its speed and hardy stamina. Generally peaceful unless disturbed.
LanguageData.LotR_HorseRace.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.LotR_HorseRace.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.LotR_HorseRace.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.LotR_HorseRace.tools.3.label: head
